## Domain rules for HR features
- When dealing with **working hours, overtime, leaves, weekly rest, WPS**:  
  - Cross-check with:  
    - Federal Decree‑Law 33/2021 (as amended) ➜ cite article numbers.  
    - Cabinet Resolution 1/2022 (Executive Regulations).  
    - MOHRE guides on **Working hours, Overtime, WPS**.  
- For every PR touching these areas, include a **Compliance Checklist** section in the PR description:  
  - Working hours ≤ 8/day, 48/week; overtime ≤ 2/day; 144 in any three weeks; premium rates; weekly rest; Ramadan reduction; night overtime rule exceptions for shift work.  
  - Salary flows via **WPS** and within timelines.  
  - Links to the exact official articles/guides referenced.  
- *(Add your internal conventions here.)*
